    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getRecommendedBranchingFactor()
      This computes the recommended branching factor for the index based on an examination of the current branching factor, an assumed nominal page size of 8k, the min, max, and average node and leaf sizes, and the histogram of the allocation sizes for the index.
      void visit(AbstractHTree htree, com.bigdata.htree.AbstractPage node)

      • getRecommendedBranchingFactor

        public int getRecommendedBranchingFactor()
        This computes the recommended branching factor for the index based on an examination of the current branching factor, an assumed nominal page size of 8k, the min, max, and average node and leaf sizes, and the histogram of the allocation sizes for the index. TODO This method always returns the current value of [addressBits]. It should be modified to compute a target value for [addressBits] based on the same criteria that are used for the B+Tree.
        Specified by:
        getRecommendedBranchingFactor in class PageStats
        Returns:
        See Also:
        Optimize RWStore allocator sizes TODO This says "branching factor", but {@link #m} is overloaded and is the branching factor for the BTree and the addressBits for the HTree. This method should be renamed (or moved into the concrete instances of this class).
